example_py: Cuòwù xìnxī de sǎnbù zàochéng le hùnluàn.
example_en: The spread of misinformation caused confusion.

example_zh: 企业需要申报税款。

example_zh: 我们要保护地球的生态环境。
example_py: Wǒmen yào bǎohù dìqiú de shēngtài huánjìng.
example_en: We must protect the planet's ecosystem.

meaning: to realize; to achieve; to implement
example_zh: 我们的梦想终于实现了。
example_py: Wǒmen de mèngxiǎng zhōngyú shíxiàn le.
example_en: Our dreams finally came true.

example_zh: 这两个概念的实质是不同的。
example_py: Zhè liǎng ge gàiniàn de shízhì shì bútuóng de.
example_en: The essence of these two concepts is different.

example_zh: 这是不容否认的事实。

meaning: to comply with; to adapt to; to go along with
example_zh: 我们必须顺应时代的发展。
example_py: Wǒmen bìxū shùnyìng shídài de fāzhǎn.

example_py: Chuàngxīn xūyào kāifàng de sīwéi.
example_en: Innovation requires open thinking.

example_py: Kēxuéjiāmen zhèngzài tànsuǒ yǔzhòu de mìmì.

example_py: Zhè bù zuòpǐn tǐxiàn le shēnkè de shèhuì yìyì.

example_zh: 我们需要调节工作和生活的平衡。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào tiáojié gōngzuò hé shēnghuó de pínghuà.

example_py: Tōngcháng qíngkuàng xia zhèyàng zuò shì duì de.

example_py: Kēxué shíyàn qǔdé le zhòngdà túpò.

example_py: Qǐyè shíxiàn le guǎnlǐ de wǎngluòhuà.

meaning: to be primarily; as the main
example_zh: 这个计划以发展为主。

example_py: Xuéshengmen xūyào shíjiān lái xiāohuà zhèxiē zhīshi.

example_zh: 我们开发了新型的产品。
example_py: Wǒmen kāifā le xīnxíng de chǎnpǐn.

example_zh: 建立信任需要时间。

example_zh: 他在金融行业工作。
example_py: Tā zài jīnróng hángyè gōngzuò.
example_en: He works in the finance industry.

example_zh: 文件需要进行修改。
example_py: Wénjiàn xūyào jìnxíng xiūgǎi.
example_en: The document needs to be revised.

example_zh: 我们需要共同努力。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào gòngtóng nǔlì.

example_zh: 我们选取了最佳的方案。
example_py: Wǒmen xuǎnqǔ le zuìjiā de fāngàn.

example_zh: 我们不能压制任何人的声音。

example_py: Jìshù de yǎnjìn tuīdòng le shèhuì jìnbù.

example_zh: 我们收集了足够的样本进行研究。
example_py: Wǒmen shōují le zúgòu de yàngběn jìnxíng yánjiū.

meaning: to depend on; dependence; to rely on
example_zh: 我们不能过度依赖外援。
example_py: Wǒmen búnéng guòdù yīlài wàiyuán.

example_py: Wǔshí suì yǐshang de rén kěyǐ shēnqǐng.

example_zh: 他在行业中有很大的影响力。

meaning: to respond to; to cope with; response
example_zh: 我们要有充分的准备应对挑战。

example_zh: 我们优化了工作流程。

example_zh: 企业发展的同时，与此同时要重视社会责任。

example_zh: 项目的进展超过了我们的预期。
example_py: Xiàngmù de jìnzhǎn chāoguò le wǒmen de yùqī.

example_zh: 这是基本的工作原则。
example_py: Zhè shì jīběn de gōngzuò yuánzé.

example_zh: 公司的运营需要专业的管理。
example_py: Gōngsī de yùnyíng xūyào zhuānyè de guǎnlǐ.

example_zh: 长期的战略很重要。
example_py: Chángqī de zhànlüè hěn zhòngyào.

meaning: to reorganize; to put in order; reorganization
example_zh: 我们需要整顿工作秩序。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào zhěngdùn gōngzuò zhìxù.

example_zh: 会议将在明天正式开始。
example_py: Huìyì jiāng zài míngtiān zhèngshì kāishǐ.

example_zh: 这不仅是经济问题，也是政治问题。
example_py: Zhè bújǐn shì jīngjì wèntí, yě shì zhèngzhì wèntí.

example_zh: 强大的科技力量支撑了发展。
example_py: Qiángdà de kējì lìliàng zhīchēng le fāzhǎn.

example_zh: 他质疑了这个理论的正确性。
example_py: Tā zhìyí le zhège lǐlùn de zhèngquèxìng.
example_en: He questioned the correctness of this theory.

example_zh: 我们需要制定中长期的计划。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào zhìdìng zhōng chángqī de jìhuà.

example_zh: 这个判断太主观了。
example_py: Zhège pànduàn tài zhǔguān le.
example_en: This judgment is too subjective.

example_zh: 学生的注意力很容易分散。
example_py: Xuésheng de zhùyìlì hěn róngyì fēnsàn.

example_zh: 我们需要合理利用资源。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào héalǐ lìyòng zīyuán.

example_zh: 企业要有自主的创新能力。

example_zh: 爱国精神是文化的重要组成部分。

meaning: to hint; to imply; dark indication

example_py: Tā de huà ànshì le yīxiē wèntí de cúnzài.

meaning: to arrange; to settle; to place
example_zh: 政府为失业者安置了新的工作机会。

example_zh: 作家需要保护他们的版权利益。
example_py: Zuòjiā xūyào bǎohù tāmen de bǎnquán lìyì.

meaning: to promulgate; to issue; to announce
example_zh: 新法律已经正式颁布实施。
example_py: Xīn fǎlǜ yǐjīng zhèngshì bānbù shíshī.

meaning: to retain; to keep; to preserve
example_zh: 企业保留了对权益的保护权。
example_py: Qǐyè bǎoliú le duì quányì de bǎohù quán.

example_zh: 员工期望获得公平的报酬。
example_py: Yuángōng qīwàng huòdé gōngpíng de bàochoú.

example_zh: 这部作品展现了人类的悲剧命运。
example_py: Zhè bù zuòpǐn zhǎnxiàn le rénlèi de bēijù mìngyùn.

example_zh: 我们需要理解问题的本质。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào lǐjiě wèntí de běnzhì.
example_en: We need to understand the essence of the problem.

example_zh: 男女员工的比例基本相等。
example_py: Nán nǚ yuángōng de bǐlì jīběn xiāngděng.
example_en: The ratio of male to female employees is roughly equal.

meaning: to avoid; to dodge; to evade
example_zh: 他试图避开这个敏感话题。
example_py: Tā shìtú bìkāi zhège mǐngǎn huàtí.

example_zh: 这座建筑是城市的标志。
example_py: Zhè zuò jiànzhù shì chéngshì de biāozhì.

example_zh: 企业推进产品的标准化生产。

meaning: is not; it is not the case that
example_zh: 这个问题并非很难解决。

example_zh: 他聪明并且富有才华。

meaning: to survey widely; to have extensive knowledge; panoramic view
example_zh: 他博览群书，学问渊博。

example_zh: 政府部署了新的改革措施。

example_zh: 财务部门负责管理公司资金。
example_py: Cáiwù bùmén fùzé guǎnlǐ gōngsī zījīn.

example_zh: 企业需要制定明智的发展策略。
example_py: Qǐyè xūyào zhìdìng míngzhì de fāzhǎn cèlüè.

example_zh: 工程师们测量了建筑的高度。
example_py: Gōngchéngshī men cèliàng le jiànzhù de gāodù.
example_en: The engineers measured the height of the building.

example_zh: 这个改革是彻底的结构调整。
example_py: Zhège gǎigé shì chèdǐ de jiégòu tiáozhěng.

example_zh: 公司需要降低生产成本。

meaning: to undertake; to host; to organize; to assume responsibility
example_zh: 学校承办了市级文化交流活动。
example_py: Xuéxiào chéngbàn le shìjí wénhuà jiāoliú huódòng.

meaning: to carry; to bear; to support; to contain

meaning: to present; to display; to show; to appear
example_zh: 改革成果呈现了新的发展面貌。

example_zh: 他追求崇高的理想和信念。

example_zh: 教育是改变贫困人口的出路。
example_py: Jiàoyù shì gǎibiàn pínkùn rénkǒu de chūlù.

example_zh: 新书预计下月出版发行。
example_py: Xīnshū yùjì xiàyuè chūbǎn fāxíng.

example_zh: 艺术家进行了新的创作尝试。
example_py: Yìshùjiā jìnxíng le xīn de chuàngzuò chǎngshì.

example_zh: 这是一个纯粹的商业决策。
example_py: Zhè shì yīgè chúnpùn de shāngyè juécè.
example_en: This is a purely commercial decision.

example_zh: 政府出台了多项扶持措施。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ chūtái le duō xiàng fúchí cuòshī.

example_zh: 企业启动了大规模的设备升级。
example_py: Qǐyè qǐdòng le dàguīmó de shèbèi shēngjí.

meaning: to replace; to substitute for; instead of
example_zh: 新技术逐步代替了旧的生产方式。
example_py: Xīn jìshù zhúbù dàitì le jiù de shēngchǎn fāngshì.

meaning: to worry; to be concerned; worry; concern
example_zh: 领导对项目进展表示担忧。
example_py: Lǐngdǎo duì xiàngmù jìnzhǎn biǎoshì dānyōu.

meaning: authorities; the powers that be; officials
example_zh: 有关当局已经采取了行动。

meaning: the most urgent matter at hand; of paramount importance
example_zh: 解决这个问题是当务之急。
example_py: Jiějué zhège wèntí shì dāngwù zhī jí.

example_zh: 文化建设涉及道德的重要问题。
example_py: Wénhuà jiànshè shèjí dàodé de zhòngyào wèntí.

meaning: to resist; to boycott; to oppose; resistance
example_zh: 消费者抵制了不合理的价格。
example_py: Xiāofèi zhě dǐzhì le búhélǐ de jiàgé.
example_en: Consumers resisted unreasonable prices.

meaning: to comment on; to critique; commentary
example_zh: 专家对改革政策进行了点评。
example_py: Zhuānjiā duì gǎigé zhèngcè jìnxíng le diǎnpíng.

example_zh: 我们需要明确定义这个概念。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào míngquè dìngyì zhège gàiniàn.
example_en: We need to clearly define this concept.

meaning: to urge; to spur on; to oversee; to supervise
example_zh: 管理层督促项目按时完成。
example_py: Guǎnlǐ céng dūcù xiàngmù ànshí wánchéng.
example_en: Management urged the project to be completed on time.

example_zh: 企业实现了产品的多元化发展。
example_py: Qǐyè shíxiàn le chǎnpǐn de duōyuánhuà fāzhǎn.
example_en: The enterprise achieved product diversification.

example_zh: 评估标准需要统一的尺度。
example_py: Píngūn biāozhǔn xūyào tǒngyī de chǐdù.
example_en: Assessment standards require a unified measure.

example_zh: 申报过程需要按照规定程序进行。
example_py: Shēnbào guòchéng xūyào ànzhào guīdìng chéngxù jìnxíng.

meaning: impact; shock; to impact; to strike
example_zh: 经济波动对企业造成了冲击。
example_py: Jīngjì bōdòng duì qǐyè zàochéng le chōngjī.

meaning: to enrich; to fill; enriched; rich

example_py: Jiàoyù chōngshí le tā de zhīshi chǔbèi.

meaning: besides; in addition; apart from this; furthermore
example_zh: 除此之外，还有其他需要注意的问题。
example_py: Chúcǐ zhī wài, háiyǒu qītā xūyào zhùyì de wèntí.

meaning: to inherit; to pass on; inheritance; legacy

example_py: Wénhuà xūyào dàidài chuánchéng hé fāzhǎn.

meaning: to promote; to spur; to cause; to bring about
example_zh: 改革的成功促使了更多创新。
example_py: Gǎigé de chéngōng cùshǐ le gèngduō chuàngxīn.

example_zh: 认识到错误是改正的第一步。
example_py: Rènshi dào cuòwù shì gǎizhèng de dì yī bù.

meaning: to reach; to achieve; to attain
example_zh: 目标已经达到预期水平。
example_py: Mùbiāo yǐjīng dádào yùqī shuǐpíng.

meaning: to strike; to crack down on; to combat; blow
example_zh: 政府打击了非法经营活动。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ dǎjī le fēifǎ jīngyíng huódòng.
example_en: The government cracked down on illegal business activities.

meaning: to break; to breach; to overcome; to shatter
example_zh: 改革打破了旧有的思维方式。
example_py: Gǎigé dǎpò le jiùyǒu de sīwéi fāngshì.
example_en: Reform broke old patterns of thinking.

meaning: substantially; significantly; by a wide margin
example_zh: 销售额大幅增长，超过预期。
example_py: Xiāoshòu é dàfú zēngzhǎng, chāoguò yùqī.

meaning: roughly; approximately; in general; more or less
example_zh: 情况大致相同，没有太大差异。
example_py: Qíngkuàng dàzhì xiāngtóng, méiyǒu tài dà chāyì.

example_py: Jiàoyù péiyǎng xuésheng de zōnghé sùyǎng.

meaning: to take the lead; to be first
example_zh: 我们率先推行这项改革。
example_py: Wǒmen shuàixiān tuīxíng zhè xiàng gǎigé.
example_en: We took the lead in implementing this reform.

example_py: Wéndàng zhōng xūyào tiānjiā gèngduō zhèngjù.

example_py: Yòng tōngsú de yǔyán jiěshì fùzá gàiniàn.

example_py: Qǐyè xūyào tuòzhǎn xīn de shìchǎng lǐngyù.

example_py: Cóng wēiguān jiǎodù fēnxī jīngjì xiànxiàng.

example_py: Zhèngcè zhǐzài wéichí jīngjì zēngzhǎng dònglì.

example_py: Fǎlǜ tǐxì xūyào gèngjiā wánbèi.

example_py: Guǎnlǐ cǎiyòng wǎnggéhuà de xīn móshì.

example_py: Yào lǐjiě wénhuà bèijǐng de zhòngyàoxìng.

example_py: Gǎigé wěnbù tuījìn qǔdé chénngxiào.

example_py: Yánjiū xūyào chákè dàliàng wénxiàn.

example_zh: 推出了一系列改革举措。

example_zh: 理论与实践相辅相成。

example_py: Liǎng guó xiānghù zūnjìng hé lǐjiě.

example_zh: 这个原则向来得到重视。
example_py: Zhège yuánzé xiàngái dedào zhòngshì.

example_py: Zhège biāozhì xiàngzh征 le wǒmen de chěngnuò.

example_zh: 避免消极态度对工作的影响。

example_py: Duō zhǒng xíngshì de jiàoxué huódòng.

example_zh: 学科交叉融合促进发展。

meaning: to extend; to stretch; to prolong
example_zh: 研究延伸到新的领域。

example_zh: 学术研究要求严谨的态度。
example_py: Xuéshù yánjiū yāoqiú yánjǐn de tàidù.

example_zh: 思想观念的演化过程。

example_zh: 教育发展要优先考虑。

example_zh: 资源总是有限的。

example_zh: 教育的根本任务是育人。

example_py: Lǐjiě jīběn yuánlǐ hěn zhòngyào.

meaning: to unfold; to develop; to launch
example_zh: 调查工作即将展开。
example_py: Diàochá gōngzuò jíjiāng zhǎnkāi.

example_py: Kējì shì jīngjì fāzhǎn de zhīzhù.

example_zh: 制定政策需要广泛调研。
example_py: Zhìdìng zhèngcè xūyào guǎngfàn diàoyán.

example_py: Zhè shì yī ge zhòngdà de zhànlüè juédinì.

example_py: Qǐyè shì shìchǎng jīngjì de zhǔtǐ.

example_py: Yào zhuānzhù yú héxīn yèwu fāzhǎn.

example_py: Qúnzhòng de zìfā cānyù hěn zhòngyào.

meaning: to arrange; to line up; arrangement
example_zh: 按特定顺序排列数据。
example_py: Àn tèdìng shùnxù páiliè shùjù.

example_zh: 提供学习和交流的平台。
example_py: Tígōng xuéxí hé jiāoliú de píngátái.
example_en: Provide a platform for learning and communication.

example_zh: 教育普及是重要目标。
example_py: Jiàoyù pǔjí shì zhòngyào mùbiāo.

example_en: The reform is at its initial stage.

example_zh: 项目即将启动实施阶段。
example_py: Xiàngmù jíjiāng qǐdòng shīshī jiēduàn.

meaning: to force; to compel; forcible; mandatory
example_zh: 不能强制执行不合理政策。
example_py: Búnéng qiángzhì zhíxíng búhéhéli zhèngcè.

example_zh: 要从全局角度考虑问题。
example_py: Yào cóng quánjú jiǎodù kǎolǜ wèntí.

example_zh: 保护消费者权益很重要。
example_py: Bǎohù xiāofèizhě quányì hěn zhòngyào.

example_zh: 法律认定这是违法行为。
example_py: Fǎlǜ rèndinì zhè shì wéifǎ xíngwéi.

example_zh: 这个问题具有深刻的理论意义。
example_py: Zhège wèntí jùyǒu shēnkè de lǐlùn yìyì.
example_en: This issue has profound theoretical significance.

example_zh: 改革开放产生了深远的历史影响。
example_py: Gǎigé kāifàng chǎnshēngle shēnyuǎn de lìshǐ yǐngxiǎng.

example_zh: 理论与实践相结合是成功的关键。
example_py: Lǐlùn yǔ shíjiàn xiāng jiéhé shì chénggōng de guānjiàn.

example_py: Tóuzī zhě qīwàng huòdé wěndìng de shōuyì huítáo.

example_zh: 企业数字化转型是当今发展的重要趋势。

example_py: Tā de yǎnjiǎng jùyǒu hěn qiáng de shuōfúlì.

meaning: critical thinking; philosophical analysis; dialectical thinking
example_zh: 培养学生的思辨能力是教育的重要目标。
example_py: Péiyǎng xuésheng de sībià n néngolì shì jiàoyù de zhòngyào mùbiāo.

meaning: to shape; to mold; to form; to create
example_zh: 家庭环境塑造了孩子的性格。
example_py: Jiātíng huánjìng sùzàole háizi de xìnggé.

example_zh: 政府正在推进教育改革的实施。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ zhèngzài tuījìn jiàoyù gǎigé de shíshī.

meaning: to lead; to command; overall command
example_zh: 项目经理统领整个团队开展工作。
example_py: Xiàngmù jīnglǐ tǒnglǐng zhěngge tuánduì kāizhǎn gōngzuò.

example_zh: 他对这个问题的分析非常透彻。
example_py: Tā duì zhège wèntí de fēnxī fēicháng tòuchè.
example_en: His analysis of this issue is very thorough.

example_py: Yīgè gāoxiào de tuánduì xūyào liánghǎo de gōutōng.

example_zh: 外向的人通常更容易建立人际关系。
example_py: Wàixiàng de rén tōngcháng gèng róngyì jiànlì rénjì guānxì.

example_py: Qǐyè miànlínzhe yánzhòng de cáiwù wēijī.

meaning: for this reason; for this purpose; to this end
example_zh: 我们为此做了充分的准备。
example_py: Wǒmen wèicǐ zuòle chōngfèn de zhǔnbèi.

example_zh: 讨论围绕主要问题展开。
example_py: Tǎolùn wéirào zhǔyào wèntí zhǎnkāi.

example_zh: 保护文化遗产是全社会的责任。
example_py: Bǎohù wénhuà yíchǎn shì quán shèhuì de zérèn.
example_en: Protecting cultural heritage is the responsibility of society.

meaning: have no way to; cannot; unable to
example_zh: 由于信息缺乏，我们无从判断。
example_py: Yóuyú xìnxī quēfá, wǒmen wúcóng pànduàn.
example_en: Due to lack of information, we had no way to judge.

example_zh: 需要系统性地推进各项改革。
example_py: Xūyào xìtǒngxìng de tuījìn gèxiàng gǎigé.
example_en: Reforms need to be systematically advanced.

example_zh: 我们采用了最先进的技术设备。
example_py: Wǒmen cǎiyòngle zuì xiāngjìn de jìshù shèbèi.
example_en: We adopted the most advanced technological equipment.

example_zh: 任何事物的发展都有其限度。
example_py: Rènhé shìwù de fāzhǎn dōu yǒu qī xiàndù.

example_zh: 相对而言，这个方案更为可行。
example_py: Xiāngduì eryán, zhège fāng'àn gèngwéi kěxíng.
example_en: Relatively speaking, this plan is more feasible.

example_zh: 我们应该保持向上的精神风貌。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎochí xiàngshàng de jīngshén fēngmào.

example_zh: 团队成员需要有效的协作。
example_py: Tuánduì chéngyuán xūyào yǒuxiào de xiézuò.
example_en: Team members need effective cooperation.

meaning: new era; new age; contemporary period
example_zh: 我们正处于一个新时代的开始。
example_py: Wǒmen zhèng chǔyú yīgè xīn shídài de kāishǐ.
example_en: We are at the beginning of a new era.

example_zh: 行政部门负责制定相关政策。
example_py: Xíngzhèng bùmén fùzé zhìdìng xiāngguān zhèngcè.
example_en: Administrative departments are responsible for formulating relevant policies.

example_zh: 这款产品有多种型号可供选择。
example_py: Zhè kuǎn chǎnpǐn yǒu duō zhǒng xínghào kěgōng xuǎnzé.

example_zh: 事物的形态会随着环境而改变。
example_py: Shìwù de xíngtài huì suízhào huánjìng ér gǎibiàn.

example_zh: 读书能提高人的文化修养。
example_py: Dúshū néng tígāo rén de wénhuà xiūyǎng.
example_en: Reading can improve one's cultural cultivation.

meaning: to put learning into practice; to apply what one has learned
example_zh: 教育的最终目标是学以致用。
example_py: Jiàoyù de zuìzhōng mùbiāo shì xuéyǐzhìyòng.
example_en: The ultimate goal of education is to apply learning.

meaning: step by step; gradual progress; orderly advancement
example_zh: 学习新技能需要循序渐进。
example_py: Xuéxí xīn jìnéng xūyào xúnxùjiànjìn.
example_en: Learning new skills requires step-by-step progress.

meaning: to study and assess; to analyze and judge; research judgment
example_zh: 专家们对形势进行了深入的研判。
example_py: Zhuānjiāmen duì xíngshì jìnxíngle shēnrù de yánjuàn.
example_en: Experts conducted in-depth analysis and assessment of the situation.

meaning: to verify; to validate; verification; testing
example_zh: 这个假设需要通过实验来验证。
example_py: Zhège jiǎshè xūyào tōngguò shíyàn lái yànzhèng.
example_en: This hypothesis needs to be verified through experimentation.

meaning: to evolve; to develop; to transform; evolution
example_zh: 社会形态的演变反映了历史发展。
example_py: Shèhuì xíng tài de yǎnbiàn fǎnyìngle lìshǐ fāzhǎn.
example_en: The evolution of social forms reflects historical development.

meaning: on one hand; in one respect; on one side
example_zh: 一方面要提高效率，另一方面要保证质量。
example_py: Yī fāngmiàn yào tígāo xiàolǜ, lìng yī fāngmiàn yào bǎozhèng zhìliàng.
example_en: On one hand we need to improve efficiency; on the other, ensure quality.

example_zh: 传统文化是我们珍贵的遗产。
example_py: Chuántǒng wénhuà shì wǒmen zhēnguì de yíchǎn.

example_zh: 这项研究具有重大的科学意义。
example_py: Zhè xiàng yánjiū jùyǒu zhòngdà de kēxué yìyì.
example_en: This research has major scientific significance.

example_zh: 有很多因素影响项目的成功。
example_py: Yǒu hěnduō yīnsù yǐngxiǎng xiàngmù de chénggōng.
example_en: Many factors affect project success.

example_zh: 初次见面留下了深刻的印象。
example_py: Chūcì jiànmiàn liúxiàle shēnkè de yìnxiàng.
example_en: The first meeting left a deep impression.

meaning: to come into being as required by the times; timely emergence
example_zh: 这个新技术应运而生，解决了长期问题。
example_py: Zhège xīn jìshù yìngyùn érshēng, jiějuéle chángqī wèntí.
example_en: This new technology emerged to solve long-standing problems.

example_zh: 改革需要勇气和决心。
example_py: Gǎigé xūyào yǒngqì hé juéxīn.

example_zh: 各部门应该有机地协调工作。
example_py: Gè bùmén yīnggāi yǒujī de xiétiáo gōngzuò.

example_zh: 工作要有序地开展，不能仓促。
example_py: Gōngzuò yào yǒuxù de kāizhǎn, búnéng cāngjù.

meaning: different from the masses; distinctive; unique
example_zh: 这个产品的设计与众不同。
example_py: Zhège chǎnpǐn de shèjì yǔzhòng búdòng.

meaning: to cultivate talent; talent cultivation; to nurture talent
example_zh: 学校的主要任务是育才成人。
example_py: Xuéxiào de zhǔyào rènwu shì yùcái chéngrén.
example_en: The school's main task is to cultivate talent and develop character.

example_zh: 这个故事的寓意是坚持就会成功。
example_py: Zhège gùshì de yùyì shì jiānchí jiùhuì chénggōng.
example_en: The moral of this story is that persistence leads to success.

example_zh: 这个传统的渊源可以追溯到古代。
example_py: Zhège chuántǒng de yuányuán kěyǐ zhuīsù dào gǔdài.
example_en: The origin of this tradition can be traced to ancient times.

example_zh: 要从问题的源头来解决困难。
example_py: Yào cóng wèntí de yuántou lái jiějué kùnnan.
example_en: We should solve problems from their source.

meaning: to operate; to function; operation; working mechanism
example_zh: 系统的运作需要多个部分的协调。
example_py: Xìtǒng de yùnzuò xūyào duō ge bùfen de xiétiáo.
example_en: The system's operation requires coordination of multiple parts.

meaning: prospect; outlook; to look forward; vision
example_zh: 我们对未来的发展前景充满展望。
example_py: Wǒmen duì wèilái de fāzhǎn qiánjǐng chōngmǎn zhǎnwàng.
example_en: We have optimistic prospects for future development.

meaning: unity of knowledge and action; knowing and doing are one
example_zh: 真正的智慧在于知行合一。
example_py: Zhēnzhèng de zhìhuì zàiyú zhī xíng héyī.
example_en: True wisdom lies in the unity of knowledge and action.

meaning: to carry out; to execute; to implement; execution
example_zh: 制度的执行效果决定了管理的成效。
example_py: Zhìdù de zhíxíng xiàoguǒ juédìngle guǎnlǐ de chénggxiào.
example_en: Implementation effectiveness determines management results.

example_zh: 建立科学的管理制度至关重要。
example_py: Jiànlì kēxué de guǎnlǐ zhìdù zhìguānzhòngyào.
example_en: Establishing a scientific management system is crucial.

example_zh: 人工智能正在改变各行各业。
example_py: Réngōng zhìnéng zhèngzài gǎibiàn gèxíng gèyè.
example_en: Artificial intelligence is changing every industry.

example_zh: 积累丰富的智识对成长很重要。
example_py: Jīlěi fēngfù de zhìshi duì chéngzhǎng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Accumulating rich knowledge is important for growth.

example_zh: 房产中介在买卖双方之间起重要作用。
example_py: Fángchǎn zhōngjiè zài mǎimài shuāngfāng zhījiān qǐ zhòngyào zuòyòng.
example_en: Real estate agencies play an important role between buyers and sellers.

example_zh: 中期目标的制定需要充分调研。
example_py: Zhōngqī mùbiāo de zhìdìng xūyào chōngfèn diàoyán.
example_en: Setting medium-term goals requires thorough research.

example_zh: 经济的周期性波动是正常现象。
example_py: Jīngjì de zhōuqīxìng bōdòng shì zhèngcháng xiànxiàng.
example_en: Cyclical fluctuations in the economy are normal.

example_zh: 这个观点已经成为社会的主流认识。
example_py: Zhège guāndiǎn yǐjīng chéngwéi shèhuì de zhǔliú rènshi.
example_en: This viewpoint has become the mainstream view in society.

meaning: special project; specific item; earmarked; designated
example_zh: 政府拨款用于专项研究基金。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ bō kuǎn yònyú zhuānxiàng yánjiū jījīn.
example_en: Government allocated funds for a special research project.

example_zh: 企业转型升级需要创新的思维。
example_py: Qǐyè zhuǎnxíng shēngjí xūyào chuàngxīn de sīwéi.
example_en: Enterprise transformation requires innovative thinking.

meaning: to convert; to transform; conversion; to translate into
example_zh: 知识需要转化为实际的能力。
example_py: Zhīshi xūyào zhuǎnhuà wéi shíjì de néngolì.
example_en: Knowledge needs to be converted into practical ability.

example_zh: 创业需要充足的启动资本。
example_py: Chuàngyè xūyào chōngzú de qǐdòng zīběn.
example_en: Starting a business requires sufficient startup capital.

example_zh: 这个项目具有高度的综合性。
example_py: Zhège xiàngmù jùyǒu gāodù de zōnghéxìng.
example_en: This project has high comprehensiveness.

example_zh: 改革开放走向了深入阶段。
example_py: Gǎigé kāifàng zǒuxiàngle shēnrù jiēduàn.
example_en: Reform and opening up moved to a deeper stage.

meaning: to bring about; to facilitate; to lead to; to cause
example_zh: 多种因素共同促成了这次成功。
example_py: Duō zhǒng yīnsù gòngtóng cùchéngle zhè cì chénggōng.
example_en: Multiple factors combined to bring about this success.

example_zh: 我们的使命是为人民服务。
example_py: Wǒmen de shǐmìng shì wèi rénmín fúwù.
example_en: Our mission is to serve the people.

example_zh: 一个组织的生命力在于创新。
example_py: Yīgè zǔzhī de shēngmìnglì zàiyú chuàngxīn.
example_en: An organization's vitality lies in innovation.

meaning: conducive to; favorable for; advantageous to; beneficial to
example_zh: 开放政策有利于经济发展。
example_py: Kāifàng zhèngcè yǒulìyú jīngjì fāzhǎn.
example_en: Open policies are conducive to economic development.

meaning: to strengthen; to intensify; to reinforce; to enhance
example_zh: 必须加强国家的创新能力。
example_py: Bìxū jiāqiáng guójiā de chuàngxīn néngolì.
example_en: We must strengthen the nation's innovation capacity.

meaning: to land; to take root; to be implemented; to materialize
example_zh: 好的想法需要找到落地的途径。
example_py: Hǎo de xiǎngfǎ xūyào zhǎodào luòdì de tújìng.
example_en: Good ideas need to find ways to be implemented.

meaning: wholeness; integrity; systemic nature; holistic quality
example_zh: 改革要把握整体性和协调性。
example_py: Gǎigé yào báwò zhěngtǐxìng hé xiétiáoxìng.
example_en: Reform must maintain holistic integrity and coordination.

example_zh: 我们需要对问题进行深度分析。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào duì wèntí jìnxíng shēndù fēnxī.
example_en: We need to conduct in-depth analysis of the issue.

example_zh: 这个技术已经得到广泛应用。
example_py: Zhège jìshù yǐjīng déidào guǎngfàn yìngyòng.
example_en: This technology has gained widespread application.

meaning: further; to advance further; moreover; in addition
example_zh: 我们将进一步推进改革开放。
example_py: Wǒmen jiāng jìnyībù tuījìn gǎigé kāifàng.
example_en: We will further advance reform and opening up.

example_zh: 各部门需要协同合作完成任务。
example_py: Gè bùmén xūyào xiétóng hézuò wánchéng rènwu.
example_en: Each department needs synergistic collaboration to complete the task.

meaning: internalization; to internalize; to absorb and assimilate
example_zh: 学生要把知识内化为自己的能力。
example_py: Xuésheng yào bǎ zhīshi nèihuà wéi zìjǐ de néngolì.
example_en: Students should internalize knowledge as their own ability.

example_zh: 改革的成效已经充分显现。
example_py: Gǎigé de chéngxiào yǐjīng chōngfèn xiǎnxiàn.
example_en: The results of reform have been fully demonstrated.

meaning: to activate; to energize; to stimulate; activation
example_zh: 创新可以激活组织的发展活力。
example_py: Chuàngxīn kěyǐ jīhuó zǔzhī de fāzhǎn huólì.
example_en: Innovation can activate organizational vitality.

meaning: to respond; to reply; response; to react
example_zh: 政府及时回应了群众的关切。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ jíshí huíyìngle qúnzhòng de guānqiè.
example_en: The government promptly responded to public concerns.

example_zh: 经济增长势头保持强劲。
example_py: Jīngjì zēngzhǎng shìtou bǎochí qiángjìng.
example_en: Economic growth momentum remains strong.

meaning: to drive; to propel; to motivate; driving force
example_zh: 创新是发展的主要驱动力。
example_py: Chuàngxīn shì fāzhǎn de zhǔyào qūdònglì.
example_en: Innovation is the main driving force for development.

meaning: core value; fundamental value; essential worth
example_zh: 诚信是企业的核心价值。
example_py: Chéngxìn shì qǐyè de héxīn jiàzhí.
example_en: Integrity is the core value of enterprises.

meaning: the entire process; the whole course; throughout
example_zh: 从规划到实施，全程需要监督。
example_py: Cóng guīhuà dào shíshī, quánchéng xūyào jiānchá.
example_en: From planning to implementation, supervision is needed throughout.

example_zh: 民主制度保障了公民的权利。
example_py: Mínzhǔ zhìdù bǎozhàng le gōngmín de quánlì.
example_en: The democratic system safeguards the rights of citizens.

example_zh: 宪法是国家的根本法。
example_py: Xiànfǎ shì guójiā de gēnběn fǎ.
example_en: The constitution is the fundamental law of a nation.

example_zh: 完善法制建设很重要。
example_py: Wánshàn fǎzhì jiànshè hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Perfecting the legal system is very important.

example_zh: 国会负责立法工作。
example_py: Guóhuì fùzé lìfǎ gōngzuò.
example_en: Parliament is responsible for legislative work.

example_zh: 司法独立是法治的基础。
example_py: Sīfǎ dúlì shì fǎzhì de jīchǔ.
example_en: Judicial independence is the basis of rule of law.

example_zh: 警察严格执法保护居民。
example_py: Jǐngchá yángé zhífǎ bǎohù jūmín.
example_en: Police enforce the law strictly to protect residents.

example_zh: 媒体对政府的监督很重要。
example_py: Méitǐ duì zhèngfǔ de jiāndū hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Media supervision of the government is important.

example_zh: 每个公民都有投票权。
example_py: Měi ge gōngmín dōu yǒu tóupiào quán.
example_en: Every citizen has the right to vote.

example_zh: 公民有言论自由的权利。
example_py: Gōngmín yǒu yánlùn zìyóu de quánlì.
example_en: Citizens have the right to freedom of speech.

example_zh: 纳税是公民的法律义务。
example_py: Nàshuì shì gōngmín de fǎlǜ yìwu.
example_en: Paying taxes is a legal obligation of citizens.

example_zh: 全国选举定在明年秋天。
example_py: Quánguó xuǎnjǔ dìng zài míngnián qiūtiān.
example_en: The national election is scheduled for next autumn.

example_zh: 我们去投票支持这个提案。
example_py: Wǒmen qù tóupiào zhīchí zhège tǐ'àn.
example_en: We went to vote in support of this proposal.

example_zh: 新政权推行一系列改革。
example_py: Xīn zhèngquán tuīxíng yī xìliè gǎigé.
example_en: The new regime implemented a series of reforms.

example_zh: 国家主权神圣不可侵犯。
example_py: Guójiā zhǔquán shénshèng búkě qīnfàn.
example_en: National sovereignty is sacred and inviolable.

example_zh: 两国签署了贸易条约。
example_py: Liǎng guó qiānshǔ le màoyì tiáoyuē.
example_en: The two countries signed a trade treaty.

example_zh: 双方达成了合作协议。
example_py: Shuāngfāng dáchéng le hézuò xiéyì.
example_en: Both sides reached a cooperation agreement.

example_zh: 两国进行和平谈判。
example_py: Liǎng guó jìnxíng hépíng tánpàn.
example_en: The two countries held peace negotiations.

example_zh: 国际社会对违法国家进行制裁。
example_py: Guójì shèhuì duì wéifǎ guójiā jìnxíng zhìcái.
example_en: The international community imposed sanctions on the offending nation.

example_zh: 政府提供人道援助给灾民。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ tígōng réndào yuánzhù gěi zāimín.
example_en: The government provided humanitarian aid to disaster victims.

example_zh: 联合国致力于维护世界和平。
example_py: Liánhé guó zhìlì yú wéihù shìjiè hépíng.
example_en: The United Nations is committed to maintaining world peace.

example_zh: 国际贸易促进经济发展。
example_py: Guójì màoyì cùjìn jīngjì fāzhǎn.
example_en: International trade promotes economic development.

example_zh: 全球化影响了所有国家。
example_py: Quánqiúhuà yǐngxiǎng le suǒyǒu guójiā.
example_en: Globalization has affected all nations.

example_zh: 许多人因为工作机会移民到城市。
example_py: Xǔduō rén yīnwèi gōngzuò jīhuì yímín dào chéngshì.
example_en: Many people migrated to cities for job opportunities.

example_zh: 战争导致许多难民流离失所。
example_py: Zhànzhēng dǎozhì xǔduō nànmín liúlí shīsuǒ.
example_en: War caused many refugees to become displaced.

example_zh: 维护人权是各国的责任。
example_py: Wéihù rénquán shì gèguó de zérèn.
example_en: Protecting human rights is every nation's responsibility.

example_zh: 自由是民主社会的核心价值。
example_py: Zìyóu shì mínzhǔ shèhuì de héxin jiàzhí.
example_en: Freedom is a core value of democratic society.

example_zh: 人人都应该得到平等对待。
example_py: Rénrén dōu yīnggāi huòdào píngděng duìdài.
example_en: Everyone should be treated equally.

example_zh: 司法必须公正透明。
example_py: Sīfǎ bìxū gōngzhèng tòumíng.
example_en: The judiciary must be just and transparent.

example_zh: 维护社会秩序需要所有人的参与。
example_py: Wéihù shèhuì zhìxù xūyào suǒyǒu rén de cānyù.
example_en: Maintaining social order requires everyone's participation.

example_zh: 改革开放推动了中国的发展。
example_py: Gǎigé kāifàng tuīdòng le Zhōngguó de fāzhǎn.
example_en: Reform and opening up promoted China's development.

example_zh: 对外开放引进了外资和技术。
example_py: Duìwài kāifàng yǐnjìn le wàizī hé jìshù.
example_en: Opening to the outside world attracted foreign investment and technology.

example_zh: 工业现代化是国家的目标。
example_py: Gōngyè xiàndàihuà shì guójiā de mùbiāo.
example_en: Industrial modernization is the nation's goal.

example_zh: 城镇化改变了中国农村的面貌。
example_py: Chéngzhènhuà gǎibiàn le Zhōngguó nōngcūn de miànmào.
example_en: Urbanization transformed the appearance of China's rural areas.

example_zh: 基层政府直接服务居民。
example_py: Jīcéng zhèngfǔ zhíjiē fúwù jūmín.
example_en: Grassroots government directly serves residents.

example_zh: 社区是最小的行政单位。
example_py: Shèqū shì zuìxiǎo de xíngzhèng dānwèi.
example_en: Community is the smallest administrative unit.

example_zh: 居民享有居住权和财产权。
example_py: Jūmín xiǎngyǒu jūzhù quán hé cáichǎn quán.
example_en: Residents enjoy the right to reside and own property.

example_zh: 户籍制度与教育和医疗相关。
example_py: Hùjí zhìdù yǔ jiàoyù hé yīliáo xiāngguān.
example_en: The household registration system is related to education and healthcare.

example_zh: 人事档案记录了个人的工作经历。
example_py: Rénshì dàng'àn jìlù le gèrén de gōngzuò jīnglì.
example_en: Personnel files record an individual's work history.

example_zh: 政府机构负责制定和执行政策。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ jīgòu fùzé zhìdìng hé zhíxíng zhèngcè.
example_en: Government institutions are responsible for formulating and implementing policies.

example_zh: 联合国安理会是重要的国际机构。
example_py: Liánhé guó ānlǐhuì shì zhòngyào de guójì jīgòu.
example_en: The UN Security Council is an important international body.

example_zh: 人大代表代表人民的利益。
example_py: Réndà dàibiǎo dàibiǎo rénmín de lìyì.
example_en: People's Congress representatives represent the interests of the people.

example_zh: 议案必须经过充分讨论才能通过。
example_py: Yì'àn bìxū jīngguò chōngfèn tǎolùn cáinéng tōngguò.
example_en: A bill must undergo full discussion before passing.

example_zh: 我提案改进教育制度。
example_py: Wǒ tí'àn gǎijìn jiàoyù zhìdù.
example_en: I propose to improve the education system.

example_zh: 法案在议会中经过认真审议。
example_py: Fǎ'àn zài yìhuì zhōng jīngguò rènzhēn shěnyì.
example_en: The bill underwent careful deliberation in parliament.

meaning: to pass; by means of; through
example_zh: 新法律通过了全国人大的投票。
example_py: Xīn fǎlǜ tōngguò le quánguó réndà de tóupiào.
example_en: The new law passed the vote of the National People's Congress.

example_zh: 总统否决了国会的决议。
example_py: Zǒngtǒng fǒujué le guóhuì de juéyì.
example_en: The president vetoed the resolution of Congress.

example_zh: 政府监管市场以防止垄断。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ jiānguǎn shìchǎng yǐ fángzhǐ lǒngduàn.
example_en: The government regulates the market to prevent monopolies.

meaning: to violate the law; illegal; violation
example_zh: 贩毒是严重的违法行为。
example_py: Fàndú shì yánzhòng de wéifǎ xíngwéi.
example_en: Drug trafficking is a serious illegal act.

example_zh: 犯罪受害人应该得到保护。
example_py: Fànzuì shòuhàirén yīnggāi huòdào bǎohù.
example_en: Crime victims should receive protection.

example_zh: 对违法者的惩罚应该公正合理。
example_py: Duì wéifǎ zhě de chéngfá yīnggāi gōngzhèng hérlǐ.
example_en: Punishment for lawbreakers should be just and reasonable.

example_zh: 法官的判决是最终的。
example_py: Fǎguān de pànjué shì zuìzhōng de.
example_en: The judge's judgment is final.

example_zh: 被告有权向高等法院上诉。
example_py: Bèigào yǒu quán xiàng gāoděng fǎyuàn shàngsù.
example_en: The defendant has the right to appeal to a higher court.

example_zh: 律师为被告人进行法律辩护。
example_py: Lǜshī wèi bèigàorén jìnxíng fǎlǜ biànhù.
example_en: The lawyer provided legal defense for the defendant.

example_zh: 案件的判决必须基于充分证据。
example_py: Àn'jiàn de pànjué bìxū jīyú chōngfèn zhèngjù.
example_en: A case judgment must be based on sufficient evidence.

example_zh: 通过调解可以解决民事纠纷。
example_py: Tōngguò tiáojiě kěyǐ jiějué mínshì jiūfèn.
example_en: Civil disputes can be resolved through mediation.

example_zh: 商业纠纷常通过仲裁解决。
example_py: Shāngyè jiūfèn cháng tōngguò zhòngcái jiějué.
example_en: Commercial disputes are often resolved through arbitration.

example_zh: 双方达成和解协议结束了纠纷。
example_py: Shuāngfāng dáchéng héjiě xiéyì jiéshù le jiūfèn.
example_en: Both sides reached a reconciliation agreement ending the dispute.

example_zh: 邻里纠纷需要合理解决。
example_py: Línglǐ jiūfèn xūyào hérlǐ jiějué.
example_en: Neighbor disputes need to be resolved reasonably.

example_zh: 反腐败是政府的重要任务。
example_py: Fǎnfǔbài shì zhèngfǔ de zhòngyào rènwu.
example_en: Anti-corruption is an important task of the government.

example_zh: 廉洁政治是人民期望的目标。
example_py: Liánjiě zhèngzhì shì rénmín qīwàng de mùbiāo.
example_en: Clean government is what people hope for.

example_zh: 政府信息公开透明很重要。
example_py: Zhèngfǔ xìnxī gōngkāi tòumíng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Government information transparency is important.

example_zh: 官员失职要接受问责。
example_py: Guānyuán shīzhí yào jiēshòu wènzé.
example_en: Officials who neglect their duties must be held accountable.

example_zh: 公务员有保护国家利益的责任。
example_py: Gōngwùyuán yǒu bǎohù guójiā lìyì de zérèn.
example_en: Civil servants have a responsibility to protect national interests.

meaning: to assume responsibility; to be accountable
example_zh: 管理者必须为失误担责。
example_py: Guǎnlǐzhě bìxū wèi shīwù dānzé.
example_en: Managers must assume responsibility for mistakes.

meaning: dereliction of duty; neglect of duty
example_zh: 失职官员应该被撤销。
example_py: Shīzhí guānyuán yīnggāi bèi chèxiāo.
example_en: Officials guilty of dereliction of duty should be removed.

meaning: abuse of power; misconduct in office
example_zh: 官员渎职要受到严厉惩罚。
example_py: Guānyuán dúzhí yào shòudào yánlì chéngfá.
example_en: Officials guilty of abuse of power must face severe punishment.

example_zh: 举报腐败行为是公民的权利。
example_py: Jǔbào fǔbài xíngwéi shì gōngmín de quánlì.
example_en: Reporting corruption is a citizen's right.

example_zh: 记者揭发了贪污官员的罪行。
example_py: Jìzhě jiēfā le tānwū guānyuán de zuìxíng.
example_en: The journalist exposed the crimes of corrupt officials.

meaning: to investigate and deal with; to crack down on

meaning: according to rules; in compliance with regulations

example_py: Tā zài guójì qīkān fābiǎo le lùnwén.
example_en: He published a paper in an international journal.

meaning: to quote; to cite; quotation; citation
example_zh: 论文中需要正确引用数据。
example_py: Lùnwén zhōng xūyào zhèngquè yǐnyòng shùjù.
example_en: The paper needs to correctly cite data.

example_zh: 列出所有参考文献很重要。
example_py: Lièchū suǒyǒu cānkǎo wénxiàn hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Listing all references is very important.

meaning: review article; literature review; comprehensive overview
example_zh: 他写了一篇关于这个领域的综述。
example_py: Tā xiěle yī piān guānyú zhège lǐngyù de zōngshù.
example_en: He wrote a review article about this field.

example_zh: 这个假设需要通过实验来验证。
example_py: Zhège jiǎshè xūyào tōngguò shíyàn lái yànzhèng.
example_en: This hypothesis needs to be verified through experiments.

example_zh: 实验设计很重要。
example_py: Shíyàn shèjì hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Experimental design is very important.

example_zh: 论文的结论很有说服力。
example_py: Lùnwén de jiēlùn hěn yǒu shuōfúlì.
example_en: The paper's conclusion is very convincing.

meaning: logical reasoning; inference; deduction; to infer
example_zh: 通过逻辑推理可以得出结论。
example_py: Tōngguò luójí tuīlǐ kěyǐ déchū jiēlùn.
example_en: Through logical reasoning, conclusions can be drawn.

meaning: argumentation; argument; to argue; to substantiate
example_zh: 他的论证非常有力。
example_py: Tā de lùnzhèng fēicháng yǒulì.
example_en: His argument is very strong.

meaning: to refute; to rebut; rebuttal; counter-argument
example_zh: 他有力地反驳了这个观点。
example_py: Tā yǒulì de fǎnbó le zhège guāndiǎn.
example_en: He strongly refuted this viewpoint.

example_zh: 这个话题引发了很多争议。
example_py: Zhège huàtí yǐnfā le hěnduō zhēngyì.
example_en: This topic sparked considerable controversy.

example_zh: 研究人员达成了共识。
example_py: Yánjiū rényuán dáchéng le gòngshibì.
example_en: Researchers reached a consensus.

meaning: school of thought; academic school; school of philosophy
example_zh: 他属于经验主义学派。
example_py: Tā shǔyú jīngyàn zhǔyì xuépài.
example_en: He belongs to the empiricist school.

example_zh: 中国画有许多不同的流派。
example_py: Zhōngguó huà yǒu xǔduō búhuà de liúpài.
example_en: Chinese painting has many different schools.

example_zh: 科学范式会不断演变。
example_py: Kēxué fànshì huì búduàn yǎnbiàn.
example_en: Scientific paradigms continually evolve.

example_zh: 建立清晰的理论框架很重要。
example_py: Jiànlì qīngxī de lǐlùn kuàngjià hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Building a clear theoretical framework is important.

example_zh: 应用研究关注实际问题。
example_py: Yìngyòng yánjiū guānzhù shíjì wèntí.
example_en: Applied research focuses on practical problems.

meaning: basic research; fundamental research; pure research
example_zh: 基础研究对科学发展很重要。
example_py: Jīchǔ yánjiū duì kēxué fāzhǎn hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Basic research is important for scientific development.

example_zh: 交叉学科研究很有意义。
example_py: Jiāochā xuékē yánjiū hěn yǒu yìyì.
example_en: Interdisciplinary research is very meaningful.

meaning: innovative thinking; creative thinking; original thought
example_zh: 创新思维很重要。
example_py: Chuàngxīn sīwéi hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Innovative thinking is very important.

example_zh: 批判性思维是学习的关键。
example_py: Pīpàn xìng sīwéi shì xuéxí de guānjiàn.
example_en: Critical thinking is key to learning.

meaning: independent thinking; critical analysis; autonomous thought
example_zh: 鼓励学生独立思考。
example_py: Gǔlì xuésheng dúlì sīkǎo.
example_en: Encourage students to think independently.

meaning: autonomous learning; self-directed learning; independent study
example_zh: 自主学习能力很重要。
example_py: Zìzhǔ xuéxí néngly hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Autonomous learning ability is very important.

meaning: lifelong learning; continuous education; learning for life
example_zh: 终身学习很重要。
example_py: Zhōngshēn xuéxí hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Lifelong learning is very important.

meaning: quality education; holistic education; comprehensive education
example_zh: 素质教育很重要。
example_py: Sùzhì jiàoyù hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Quality education is very important.

example_zh: 应试教育面临改革。
example_py: Yìngshì jiàoyù miànlín gǎigé.
example_en: Test-oriented education faces reform.

meaning: tailor instruction to individual students; teaching according to ability
example_zh: 老师因材施教。
example_py: Lǎoshī yīncái shījiào.
example_en: Teachers teach according to students' abilities.

meaning: heuristic teaching; inquiry-based learning; Socratic method
example_zh: 启发式教学很有效。
example_py: Qǐfā shì jiàoxué hěn yǒuxiào.
example_en: Heuristic teaching is very effective.

example_zh: 互动教学能提高学生参与度。
example_py: Hùdòng jiàoxué néng tíhigh xuésheng cānyùdù.
example_en: Interactive teaching can increase student participation.

example_zh: 在线教育越来越普遍。
example_py: Zàixiàn jiàoyù yuèláiyuè pǔbiàn.
example_en: Online education is becoming increasingly common.

meaning: distance learning; remote learning; online study
example_zh: 远程学习提供了灵活性。
example_py: Yuǎnchéng xuéxí tígōng le línghuó xìng.
example_en: Distance learning provides flexibility.

meaning: vocational training; professional training; job training
example_zh: 参加职业培训很有用。
example_py: Cānjiā zhíyè péixùn hěn yǒuyòng.
example_en: Attending vocational training is very useful.

meaning: skill enhancement; professional development; skill upgrade
example_zh: 技能提升对职业发展很重要。
example_py: Jìnéng tíshēng duì zhíyè fāzhǎn hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Skill enhancement is important for career development.

meaning: assessment; evaluation; examination; appraisal; to assess
example_zh: 学年考核很重要。
example_py: Xuéniánhuà kǎohé hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Annual academic assessment is very important.

meaning: to assess excellence; to rate best; merit evaluation
example_zh: 学校定期评优。
example_py: Xuéxiào dìngqī píng yōu.
example_en: The school regularly conducts merit evaluations.

meaning: rewards and punishments; incentives and penalties
example_zh: 学校有明确的奖惩制度。
example_py: Xuéxiào yǒu míngquè de jiǎngchéng zhìdù.
example_en: The school has a clear reward and punishment system.

example_zh: 绩效评估很重要。
example_py: Jìxiào píngū hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Performance evaluation is very important.

meaning: teacher's ethics; professional ethics of teachers; pedagogical virtue
example_zh: 师德很重要。
example_py: Shīdé hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Teacher ethics is very important.

meaning: academic atmosphere; scholarly traditions; study culture
example_zh: 良好的学风很重要。
example_py: Liánghǎo de xuéfēng hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: A good academic atmosphere is very important.

example_zh: 校园很美丽。
example_py: Xiàoyuán hěn měilì.
example_en: The campus is very beautiful.

example_zh: 学生宿舍很舒适。
example_py: Xuésheng sùshè hěn shūshì.
example_en: The student dormitory is very comfortable.

example_zh: 图书馆有很多书。
example_py: Túshūguǎn yǒu hěnduō shū.
example_en: The library has many books.

example_zh: 实验室设备很先进。
example_py: Shíyànshì shèbèi hěn xiānnjìn.
example_en: The laboratory equipment is very advanced.

example_zh: 明天有一个讲座。
example_py: Míngtiān yǒu yī ge jiǎngzuò.
example_en: There is a lecture tomorrow.

example_zh: 参加研讨会很有益。
example_py: Cānjiā yántǎohuì hěn yǒuyì.
example_en: Attending the workshop is very beneficial.

meaning: academic exchange; scholarly communication; intellectual dialogue
example_zh: 学术交流很重要。
example_py: Xuéshù jiāoliú hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Academic exchange is very important.

meaning: overseas study; studying abroad; international education
example_zh: 海外留学是一个好机会。
example_py: Hǎiwài liúxué shì yī ge hǎo jīhuì.
example_en: Studying abroad is a great opportunity.

example_zh: 她是一名交换生。
example_py: Tā shì yī míng jiāohuàn shēng.
example_en: She is an exchange student.

meaning: internship; practical training; work experience; to practice
example_zh: 他在进行暑期实习。
example_py: Tā zài jìnxíng shǔqī shíxí.
example_en: He is doing a summer internship.

meaning: employment; to take a job; job placement; career
example_zh: 就业压力很大。
example_py: Jiùyè yālì hěn dà.
example_en: Employment pressure is very high.

meaning: job hunting; to seek employment; job search
example_zh: 他在积极求职。
example_py: Tā zài jījí qiúzhí.
example_en: He is actively job hunting.

meaning: recruitment; hiring; to recruit; job posting
example_zh: 公司正在招聘。
example_py: Gōngsī zhèngzài zhāopìn.
example_en: The company is recruiting.

meaning: interview; job interview; oral examination; to interview
example_zh: 明天我要去面试。
example_py: Míngtiān wǒ yào qù miànshì.
example_en: I have to go to an interview tomorrow.

meaning: resume; curriculum vitae; CV; personal record
example_zh: 我需要更新我的简历。
example_py: Wǒ xūyào gēngxīn wǒ de jiǎnlì.
example_en: I need to update my resume.

meaning: career planning; professional planning; career development strategy
example_zh: 职业规划很重要。
example_py: Zhíyè guīhuà hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Career planning is very important.

meaning: promotion; advancement; to be promoted; career advancement
example_zh: 他获得了晋升。
example_py: Tā huòdé le jìnshēng.
example_en: He received a promotion.

meaning: professional skills; specialized expertise; domain knowledge
example_zh: 发展专业技能很重要。
example_py: Fāzhǎn zhuānyè jìnéng hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Developing professional skills is very important.

meaning: transferable skills; generic competencies; soft skills
example_zh: 通用能力很重要。
example_py: Tōngyòng néngly hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Transferable skills are very important.

meaning: comprehensive quality; overall competence; holistic development
example_zh: 综合素质很重要。
example_py: Zōnghé sùzhì hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Comprehensive quality is very important.

example_zh: 建立知识库很重要。
example_py: Jiànlì zhīshi kù hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Building a knowledge base is important.

example_zh: 数据分析很重要。
example_py: Shùjù fēnxī hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Data analysis is very important.

meaning: information literacy; digital literacy; informational competence
example_zh: 信息素养很重要。
example_py: Xìnxi sùyǎng hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Information literacy is very important.

meaning: discipline development; academic program development; curriculum building
example_zh: 学科建设很重要。
example_py: Xuékē jiànshè hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Discipline development is very important.

meaning: teaching material; textbook; curriculum material; instructional content
example_zh: 教材的选择很重要。
example_py: Jiàocái de xuǎnzé hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: The choice of teaching materials is very important.

meaning: lesson preparation; to prepare for class; class planning
example_zh: 教师需要认真备课。
example_py: Jiàoshī xūyào rènzhēn bèikè.
example_en: Teachers need to prepare lessons carefully.

example_zh: 课堂气氛很活跃。
example_py: Kètáng qìfēn hěn huóyuè.
example_en: The classroom atmosphere is very active.

meaning: homework; assignment; schoolwork; to do work
example_zh: 学生需要完成作业。
example_py: Xuésheng xūyào wánchéng zuòyè.
example_en: Students need to complete their homework.

meaning: examination; test; exam; to take an exam
example_zh: 明天有期末考试。
example_py: Míngtiān yǒu qīmò kǎoshì.
example_en: There is a final exam tomorrow.

example_zh: 他的成绩很好。
example_py: Tā de chéngjì hěn hǎo.
example_en: His grades are very good.

example_zh: 他的分数很高。
example_py: Tā de fēnshù hěn gāo.
example_en: His score is very high.

example_zh: 他在班级排名第一。
example_py: Tā zài bānjí páimíng dì yī.
example_en: He ranks first in the class.

example_zh: 参加竞赛很有意义。
example_py: Cānjiā jìngsài hěn yǒu yìyì.
example_en: Participating in competitions is very meaningful.

example_zh: 他有很多才能。
example_py: Tā yǒu hěnduō cáinéng.
example_en: He has many talents.

example_zh: 培养学生的兴趣很重要。
example_py: Péiyǎng xuésheng de xìngqu hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Cultivating students' interests is very important.

example_zh: 他有很大的潜力。
example_py: Tā yǒu hěn dà de qiánly.
example_en: He has great potential.

example_zh: 这是我们的优势。
example_py: Zhè shì wǒmen de yōushì.
example_en: This is our advantage.

example_zh: 我们需要克服自己的弱点。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào kèfú zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn.
example_en: We need to overcome our weaknesses.

meaning: to participate; to take part; to attend; to join
example_zh: 我想参加这个活动。
example_py: Wǒ xiǎng cānjiā zhège huódòng.
example_en: I want to participate in this activity.

meaning: to obtain; to acquire; to gain; to achieve
example_zh: 他获得了很多成就。
example_py: Tā huòdé le hěnduō chéngjìu.
example_en: He achieved many accomplishments.

meaning: growth; development; to grow; to mature
example_zh: 这个经验促进了我的成长。
example_py: Zhège jīngyàn cùjìn le wǒ de chéngzhǎng.
example_en: This experience promoted my growth.

meaning: to overcome; to conquer; to surmount; to get over
example_zh: 我们需要克服困难。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào kèfú kùnnan.
example_en: We need to overcome difficulties.

meaning: to persist; to insist; to persevere; persistence
example_zh: 坚持就是胜利。
example_py: Jiānchí jiùshi shènglì.
example_en: Persistence is victory.

meaning: to work hard; to strive; diligent; effort
example_zh: 我会继续努力。
example_py: Wǒ huì jìxù nǔly.
example_en: I will continue to work hard.

example_zh: 她获得了教师资格证书。
example_py: Tā huòdé le jiàoshī zīgé zhèngshū.
example_en: She obtained a teacher's qualification certificate.

example_zh: 他有资格参加比赛。
example_py: Tā yǒu zīgé cānjiā bǐsài.
example_en: He is eligible to participate in the competition.

example_zh: 他有丰富的工作经验。
example_py: Tā yǒu fēngfù de gōngzuò jīngyàn.
example_en: He has rich work experience.

example_zh: 思想教育很重要。
example_py: Sīxiǎng jiàoyù hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Ideological education is very important.

example_zh: 价值观很重要。
example_py: Jiàzhí guān hěn zhòongyào.
example_en: Values are very important.

meaning: to be tolerant; to be lenient; tolerance
example_zh: 宽容他人的缺点是一种美德。
example_py: Kuānróng tārén de quēdiǎn shì yī zhǒng měidé.
example_en: Being tolerant of others' faults is a virtue.

meaning: to understand; to be considerate of
example_zh: 请体谅我的难处。
example_py: Qǐng tǐliàng wǒ de nánchǔ.
example_en: Please understand my difficult situation.

meaning: to think from another's perspective; perspective-taking
example_zh: 我们应该换位思考来理解他人。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi huàn wèi sīkǎo lái lǐjiě tārén.
example_en: We should think from others' perspectives to understand them.

meaning: to put oneself in another's shoes; to empathize
example_zh: 将心比心，你就会理解她。
example_py: Jiāng xīn bǐ xīn, nǐ jiù huì lǐjiě tā.
example_en: If you put yourself in her shoes, you will understand her.

example_zh: 这是一个误会，我们来解释一下。
example_py: Zhè shì yī ge wùhuì, wǒmen lái jiěshì yīxià.
example_en: This is a misunderstanding; let us explain.

meaning: to resolve; to dissolve; to settle
example_zh: 我们需要化解彼此之间的误会。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào huàjiě bǐcǐ zhījiān de wùhuì.
example_en: We need to resolve the misunderstandings between us.

example_zh: 我们都做出了一些妥协。
example_py: Wǒmen dōu zuòchū le yīxiē tuǒxié.
example_en: We both made some compromises.

meaning: to make concessions; to give in
example_zh: 在这个问题上，他向我让了一步。
example_py: Zài zhège wèntí shàng, tā xiàng wǒ ràng le yī bù.
example_en: On this issue, he made a concession to me.

example_zh: 他太固执了，不愿意听别人的意见。
example_py: Tā tài gùzhí le, búyuànyì tīng biérén de yìjiàn.
example_en: He is too stubborn and unwilling to listen to others.

meaning: to insist on one's own opinion
example_zh: 他总是坚持己见，从不改变想法。
example_py: Tā zǒngshì jiānchí jǐ jiàn, cóng búgǎibiàn xiǎngfǎ.
example_en: He always insists on his own opinions and never changes his mind.

example_zh: 我们应该消除对他人的偏见。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi xiāochu duì tārén de piānjiàn.
example_en: We should eliminate prejudices against others.

example_zh: 刻板印象会阻碍我们理解他人。
example_py: Kèbǎn yìnxiàng huì zǔ'ài wǒmen lǐjiě tārén.
example_en: Stereotypes hinder us from understanding others.

example_zh: 任何形式的歧视都是不可接受的。
example_py: Rènhé xíngshì de qīshì dōu shì búkě jiēshòu de.
example_en: Any form of discrimination is unacceptable.

example_zh: 我们应该互相尊重。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi hùxiāng zūnzhòng.
example_en: We should respect each other.

example_zh: 在这个团队中，我感到强烈的归属感。
example_py: Zài zhège tuánduì zhōng, wǒ gǎndào qiángliè de guīshǔ gǎn.
example_en: In this team, I feel a strong sense of belonging.

meaning: sense of security; feeling of safety
example_zh: 孩子需要从父母那里获得安全感。
example_py: Háizi xūyào cóng fùmǔ nàli huòdé ānquán gǎn.
example_en: Children need to get a sense of security from their parents.

meaning: sense of happiness; feeling of well-being
example_zh: 与家人一起时我感到幸福感最强。
example_py: Yǔ jiārén yīqǐ shí wǒ gǎndào xìngfú gǎn zuì qiáng.
example_en: I feel the strongest sense of happiness when with family.

example_zh: 完成这个项目给了我很大的满足感。
example_py: Wánchéng zhège xiàngmù gěi le wǒ hěn dà de mǎnzú gǎn.
example_en: Completing this project gave me great satisfaction.

meaning: sense of defeat; feeling of frustration
example_zh: 失败带来了深深的挫败感。
example_py: Shībài dàilái le shēnshēn de cuòbài gǎn.
example_en: Failure brought a deep sense of frustration.

meaning: sense of helplessness; feeling of powerlessness
example_zh: 面对这个问题，我感到一种无力感。
example_py: Miànduì zhège wèntí, wǒ gǎndào yī zhǒng wúlì gǎn.
example_en: Facing this problem, I feel a sense of helplessness.

example_zh: 听到这个消息，他感到失落。
example_py: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxī, tā gǎndào shīluò.
example_en: Upon hearing the news, he felt depressed.

example_zh: 对于未来，他感到有些迷茫。
example_py: Duìyú wèilái, tā gǎndào yǒuxiē míwáng.
example_en: About the future, he feels somewhat lost.

example_zh: 考试前他感到焦虑不安。
example_py: Kǎoshì qián tā gǎndào jiāolǜ búān.
example_en: Before the exam, he felt anxious and uneasy.

example_zh: 长期的压力可能导致抑郁。
example_py: Chángqī de yālì kěnéng dǎozhì yìyù.
example_en: Long-term stress may lead to depression.

example_zh: 工作的压力很大。
example_py: Gōngzuò de yālì hěn dà.
example_en: Work pressure is great.

example_zh: 心理健康和身体健康一样重要。
example_py: Xīnlǐ jiànkāng hé shēntǐ jiànkāng yīyàng zhòngyào.
example_en: Mental health is as important as physical health.

example_zh: 学会情绪管理很重要。
example_py: Xuéhuì qíngxù guǎnlǐ hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Learning emotion management is very important.

example_zh: 需要学会自我调节压力。
example_py: Xūyào xuéhuì zìwǒ tiáojié yālì.
example_en: Need to learn to self-regulate stress.

example_zh: 自我认知对个人成长很关键。
example_py: Zìwǒ rènzhī duì gèrén chéngzhǎng hěn guānjiàn.
example_en: Self-awareness is crucial for personal growth.

example_zh: 自我接纳是心理健康的基础。
example_py: Zìwǒ jiēnà shì xīnlǐ jiànkāng de jīchǔ.
example_en: Self-acceptance is the foundation of mental health.

example_zh: 她充满了自信。
example_py: Tā chōngmǎn le zìxìn.
example_en: She is full of confidence.

example_zh: 维护自尊是很重要的。
example_py: Wéihù zìzūn shì hěn zhòngyào de.
example_en: Protecting one's self-respect is very important.

example_zh: 在逆境中也要保持希望。
example_py: Zài nìjìng zhōng yě yào bǎochí xīwàng.
example_en: Even in adversity, we should maintain hope.

example_zh: 经历挫折能够让人成长。
example_py: Jīnglì cuòzhé néngggòu ràng rén chéngzhǎng.
example_en: Experiencing setbacks can make people grow.

example_zh: 具有韧性的人更容易成功。
example_py: Jùyǒu rènxìng de rén gèng róngyì chénggōng.
example_en: People with resilience succeed more easily.

example_zh: 恢复力强的人能快速适应变化。
example_py: Huīfùlì qiáng de rén néng kuàisù shìyìng biànhuà.
example_en: People with high resilience adapt to change quickly.

example_zh: 拥有成长型思维可以克服困难。
example_py: Yōngyǒu chéngzhǎng xíng sīwéi kěyǐ kèfú kùnnan.
example_en: Having a growth mindset helps overcome difficulties.

example_zh: 正确的人生观很重要。
example_py: Zhèngquè de rénshēng guān hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: A correct outlook on life is very important.

example_zh: 良好的夫妻关系需要沟通和尊重。
example_py: Liánghǎo de fūqī guānxi xūyào gōutōng hé zūnzhòng.
example_en: Good marital relationships require communication and respect.

example_zh: 良好的亲子关系对孩子成长很关键。
example_py: Liánghǎo de qīnzǐ guānxi duì háizi chéngzhǎng hěn guānjiàn.
example_en: Good parent-child relationships are crucial for children's growth.

example_zh: 代际差异常常导致家庭冲突。
example_py: Dàijì chāyì chángcháng dǎozhì jiātíng chōngtū.
example_en: Generational differences often cause family conflicts.

example_zh: 每个成员都应该承担家庭责任。
example_py: Měi ge chéngyuán dōu yīnggāi chéngdān jiātíng zérèn.
example_en: Every member should bear family responsibility.

meaning: to support (elderly parents); to provide for
example_zh: 赡养父母是我们的责任。
example_py: Shànyǎng fùmǔ shì wǒmen de zérèn.
example_en: Supporting elderly parents is our responsibility.

meaning: to raise; to rear; to bring up
example_zh: 养育孩子需要很多耐心。
example_py: Yǎngyù háizi xūyào hěnduō nàixīn.
example_en: Raising children requires a lot of patience.

meaning: to accompany; to keep company; companionship
example_zh: 父母的陪伴对孩子很重要。
example_py: Fùmǔ de péibàn duì háizi hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Parents' companionship is very important for children.

meaning: to care for; to show concern for; care
example_zh: 我们需要关爱老年人。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào guān'ài lǎoniánrén.
example_en: We need to care for the elderly.

meaning: to express affection; to show love
example_zh: 有时候应该大胆表达爱意。
example_py: Yǒu shíhou yīnggāi dàdǎn biǎodá àiyì.
example_en: Sometimes we should boldly express our affection.

example_zh: 肢体语言也能表达感情。
example_py: Zhītǐ yǔyán yě néng biǎodá gǎnqíng.
example_en: Body language can also express feelings.

example_zh: 非语言沟通同样很重要。
example_py: Fēi yǔyán gōutōng tónyàng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Non-verbal communication is equally important.

meaning: to listen attentively; to listen carefully
example_zh: 真正的沟通始于认真的倾听。
example_py: Zhēnzhèng de gōutōng shǐyú rènzhēn de qīngtīng.
example_en: True communication begins with careful listening.

example_zh: 共情能力很重要。
example_py: Gòngjìng néngglì hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: The ability to empathize is very important.

example_zh: 真正的友谊需要时间来培养。
example_py: Zhēnzhèng de yǒuyì xūyào shíjiān lái péiyǎng.
example_en: True friendship needs time to cultivate.

example_zh: 谎言可能导致信任危机。
example_py: Huǎngyán kěnéng dǎozhì xìnrèn wēijī.
example_en: Lies can lead to a crisis of confidence.

example_zh: 背叛是对友谊最大的伤害。
example_py: Bèipàn shì duì yǒuyì zuì dà de shānghài.
example_en: Betrayal is the greatest harm to friendship.

example_zh: 学会原谅别人是种美德。
example_py: Xuéhuì yuánliàng biérén shì zhǒng měidé.
example_en: Learning to forgive others is a virtue.

meaning: to be grateful; to give thanks; gratitude
example_zh: 我们应该对帮助过我们的人感恩。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi duì bāngzhù guò wǒmen de rén gǎn'ēn.
example_en: We should be grateful to those who helped us.

meaning: to treasure; to cherish; to value
example_zh: 我们应该珍惜身边的人。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi zhēnxī shēnbiān de rén.
example_en: We should cherish the people around us.

meaning: to lose; to lose out on
example_zh: 有时候要失去才能明白珍惜。
example_py: Yǒu shíhou yào shīqù cáinéng míngbai zhēnxī.
example_en: Sometimes we must lose to understand cherishing.

example_zh: 失去亲人会带来深深的悲伤。
example_py: Shīqù qīnrén huì dàilái shēnshēn de bēishāng.
example_en: Losing a loved one brings deep sorrow.

example_zh: 时间可以治愈心灵的伤口。
example_py: Shíjiān kěyǐ zhìyù xīnlíng de shānghé.
example_en: Time can heal emotional wounds.

example_zh: 痛苦往往伴随着蜕变。
example_py: Téngtòng wǎngwǎng bànsuízhe tuìbiàn.
example_en: Pain is often accompanied by transformation.

example_zh: 持续的自我提升是成功的关键。
example_py: Chíxù de zìwǒ tíshēng shì chénggōng de guānjiàn.
example_en: Continuous self-improvement is key to success.

example_zh: 自律是成功的必要条件。
example_py: Zìlǜ shì chénggōng de bìyào tiáojiàn.
example_en: Self-discipline is a necessary condition for success.

example_zh: 好的习惯养成需要时间和坚持。
example_py: Hǎo de xíguàn yǎngchéng xūyào shíjiān hé jiānchí.
example_en: Building good habits takes time and persistence.

example_zh: 有效的时间管理能提高工作效率。
example_py: Yǒuxiào de shíjiān guǎnlǐ néng tígāo gōngzuò xiàolǜ.
example_en: Effective time management improves work efficiency.

example_zh: 提高效率的方法有很多。
example_py: Tígāo xiàolǜ de fāngfǎ yǒu hěnduō.
example_en: There are many ways to improve efficiency.

example_zh: 克服拖延习惯很重要。
example_py: Kèfú tuōyán xíguàn hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Overcoming procrastination is very important.

meaning: execution; execution ability; capacity to implement
example_zh: 强大的执行力能把想法变成现实。
example_py: Qiángdà de zhíxíng lì néng bǎ xiǎngfǎ biànchéng xiànshí.
example_en: Strong execution ability turns ideas into reality.

example_zh: 定期健身对身体很有好处。
example_py: Dìngqī jiànshēn duì shēntǐ hěn yǒu hǎochù.
example_en: Regular exercise is very good for the body.

example_zh: 饮食均衡是健康的基础。
example_py: Yǐnshí jūnhéng shì jiànkāng de jīchǔ.
example_en: A balanced diet is the foundation of health.

example_zh: 规律的作息对身体和心理都有好处。
example_py: Guīlǜ de zuòxí duì shēntǐ hé xīnlǐ dōu yǒu hǎochù.
example_en: Regular routines benefit both body and mind.

example_zh: 良好的睡眠质量很重要。
example_py: Liánghǎo de shuìmián zhìliàng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Good sleep quality is very important.

example_zh: 预防慢性病很重要。
example_py: Yùfáng màn xìng bìng hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Preventing chronic diseases is very important.

meaning: to prevent; prevention; to guard against
example_zh: 预防疾病比治疗更重要。
example_py: Yùfáng jíbìng bǐ zhìliáo gèng zhòngyào.
example_en: Prevention is more important than treatment.

meaning: health preservation; to maintain health; wellness
example_zh: 养生是一种生活态度。
example_py: Yǎngshēng shì yī zhǒng shēnghuó tàidù.
example_en: Health preservation is a lifestyle attitude.

meaning: state of mind; attitude; mental state
example_zh: 积极的心态很重要。
example_py: Jījí de xīntài hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: A positive attitude is very important.

example_zh: 保持心态平和能应对各种压力。
example_py: Bǎochí xīntài pínghe néng yìngduì gèzhǒng yālì.
example_en: Maintaining a peaceful mindset helps deal with stress.

example_zh: 他对中国哲学的研究很深入。
example_py: Tā duì Zhōngguó zhéxué de yánjiū hěn shēnrù.
example_en: His research into Chinese philosophy is very thorough.

example_zh: 医学伦理是非常重要的课题。
example_py: Yīxué lúnlǐ shì fēicháng zhòngyào de huàtí.
example_en: Medical ethics is a very important topic.

example_zh: 每个人的审美标准都不一样。
example_py: Měi ge rén de shěnměi biāozhǔn dōu búyīyàng.
example_en: Everyone has different aesthetic standards.

example_zh: 青年的价值取向影响社会发展。
example_py: Qīngnián de jiàzhí qǔxiàng yǐngxiǎng shèhuì fāzhǎn.
example_en: Youth values influence social development.

example_zh: 文化的精神内涵很丰富。
example_py: Wénhuà de jīngshén nèihán hěn fēngfù.
example_en: The spiritual essence of culture is rich.

example_zh: 中国有深厚的文化底蕴。
example_py: Zhōngguó yǒu shēnhòu de wénhuà dǐyùn.
example_en: China has profound cultural heritage.

example_zh: 传承民族精神是我们的责任。
example_py: Chuánchéng mínzú jīngshén shì wǒmen de zérèn.
example_en: Inheriting the national spirit is our responsibility.

meaning: patriotic sentiment; sense of national belonging
example_zh: 诗人的家国情怀溢于言表。
example_py: Shīrén de jiāguó qínghuái yìyú yánbiǎo.
example_en: The poet's patriotic sentiment overflows in words.

example_zh: 不忘初心、牢记使命是关键。
example_py: Búwàng chūxīn, láojì shǐmìng shì guānjiàn.
example_en: Never forgetting original aspiration and mission is key.

example_zh: 我们要有责任担当的精神。
example_py: Wǒmen yào yǒu zérèn dāndang de jīngshén.
example_en: We should have a spirit of responsibility and duty.

example_zh: 他展现了无私的奉献精神。
example_py: Tā zhǎnxiàn le wúsī de fèngxiàn jīngshén.
example_en: He demonstrated a selfless spirit of dedication.

example_zh: 集体主义精神在学校得到发扬。
example_py: Jítǐ zhǔyì jīngshén zài xuéxiào déedào fāyáng.
example_en: The spirit of collectivism is promoted in schools.

example_zh: 极端的个人主义是有害的。
example_py: Jíduān de gèrén zhǔyì shì yǒuhài de.
example_en: Extreme individualism is harmful.

example_zh: 自由和平等是普世价值。
example_py: Zìyóu hé píngděng shì pǔshì jiàzhí.
example_en: Freedom and equality are universal values.

example_zh: 哲学中存在相对主义的观点。
example_py: Zhéxué zhōng cúnzài xiāngduì zhǔyì de guāndiǎn.
example_en: There are relativist views in philosophy.

example_zh: 绝对主义的观点过于极端。
example_py: Juéduì zhǔyì de guāndiǎn guòyú jíduān.
example_en: Absolutist views are too extreme.

example_zh: 我们应该充分发挥主观能动性。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi chōngfèn fāhuī zhǔguān néngdòng xìng.
example_en: We should fully leverage our subjective initiative.

example_zh: 发展有其客观规律性。
example_py: Fāzhǎn yǒu qī kèguān guīlǜ xìng.
example_en: Development follows objective laws.

example_zh: 我们做事要实事求是。
example_py: Wǒmen zuòshì yào shìshì qiúshì.
example_en: We should be pragmatic in our actions.

meaning: keeping pace with the times; advancing with the times
example_zh: 我们的思想要与时俱进。
example_py: Wǒmen de sīxiǎng yào yǔ shí jújìn.
example_en: Our thinking should keep pace with the times.

example_zh: 教育工作要求真务实。
example_py: Jiàoyù gōngzuò yào qiúzhēn wùshí.
example_en: Educational work requires pragmatism and authenticity.

example_zh: 企业要注重开拓创新。
example_py: Qǐyè yào zhùzhòng kāituò chuàngxīn.
example_en: Enterprises should focus on pioneering innovation.

meaning: to inherit the past and blaze the future
example_zh: 我们要继往开来，砥砺前行。
example_py: Wǒmen yào jìwǎng kāilái, dǐlì qiánxíng.
example_en: We should inherit the past and create the future.

meaning: linking the past with the future
example_zh: 这个时代具有承前启后的意义。
example_py: Zhège shídài jùyǒu chéngqián qǐhòu de yìyì.
example_en: This era has significance in linking past and future.

meaning: passing the torch; transmitting a legacy
example_zh: 文化要薪火相传。
example_py: Wénhuà yào xīnhuǒ xiāngchuán.
example_en: Culture should be passed down through generations.

example_zh: 每个时代都有其历史使命。
example_py: Měi ge shídài dōu yǒu qī lìshǐ shǐmìng.
example_en: Every era has its own historical mission.

example_zh: 创新是当代时代精神的体现。
example_py: Chuàngxīn shì dāngdài shídài jīngshén de tǐxiàn.
example_en: Innovation embodies the spirit of our age.

example_zh: 我们要树立文化自信。
example_py: Wǒmen yào shùlì wénhuà zìxìn.
example_en: We should establish cultural confidence.

meaning: national rejuvenation; revival of the nation
example_zh: 实现民族复兴是伟大梦想。
example_py: Shíxiàn mínzú fùxīng shì wěidà mèngxiǎng.
example_en: Achieving national rejuvenation is a great dream.

example_zh: 人类命运共同体的理念很重要。
example_py: Rénlèi mìngyùn gòngtóng tǐ de lǐniàn hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: The concept of shared human destiny is important.

example_zh: 文化应该包容并蓄。
example_py: Wénhuà yīnggāi bāoróng bìngxù.
example_en: Culture should be inclusive and open.

meaning: to learn from others' strengths and remedy one's weaknesses
example_zh: 我们要相互取长补短。
example_py: Wǒmen yào xiānghu qǔ cháng bǔ duǎn.
example_en: We should learn from each other's strengths.

meaning: the sea embraces all rivers; all-embracing
example_zh: 这个城市海纳百川，包容并蓄。
example_py: Zhège chéngshì hǎi nà bǎi chuān, bāoróng bìngxù.
example_en: The city is inclusive, embracing diverse cultures.

meaning: to widely gather people's strong points
example_zh: 这个计划博采众长。
example_py: Zhège jìhuà báocǎi zhǔngcháng.
example_en: This plan draws on many strong points.

meaning: to discard the dross and retain the essence
example_zh: 我们应该去粗取精。
example_py: Wǒmen yīnggāi qùcū qǔjīng.
example_en: We should discard dross and retain essence.

meaning: to discard the false and preserve the true
example_zh: 研究要去伪存真。
example_py: Yánjiū yào qùwěi cúnzhēn.
example_en: Research should discard false claims and preserve truth.

meaning: to sublate; to abolish while retaining what is valuable
example_zh: 哲学上的扬弃是辩证法的重要概念。
example_py: Zhéxué shang de yángqì shì biànzhèngfǎ de zhòngyào gàiniàn.
example_en: Sublation in philosophy is a key dialectical concept.

example_zh: 我们要不断超越自我。
example_py: Wǒmen yào búduàn chāoyuè zìwǒ.
example_en: We should constantly transcend ourselves.

example_zh: 情感的升华可以产生美的感受。
example_py: Qíngganǎn de shēnghuà kěyǐ chǎnshēng měi de gǎnshòu.
example_en: The sublimation of emotion can create aesthetic feeling.

example_zh: 内心的想法要外化成行动。
example_py: Nèixīn de xiǎngfǎ yào wàihuà chéng xíngdòng.
example_en: Inner thoughts should be externalized into action.

example_zh: 君子应该言行一致。
example_py: Jūnzǐ yīnggāi yánxíng yīzhì.
example_en: A person of virtue should have consistent words and actions.

meaning: to be the same inside and outside; to be genuine
example_zh: 他是个表里如一的人。
example_py: Tā shì ge biǎolǐ rúyī de rén.
example_en: He is a person whose interior and exterior match.

meaning: name and reality accord; substance matches name
example_zh: 他的地位和能力名实相符。
example_py: Tā de dìwèi hé nénghlì míngshí xiāngfú.
example_en: His position and abilities match his reputation.

meaning: flashy but lacking substance; showy but hollow
example_zh: 这个方案华而不实。
example_py: Zhège fāng'àn huá ér búshí.
example_en: This plan is showy but lacks substance.

example_zh: 他的描述言过其实。
example_py: Tā de miáoshù yánguò qīshí.
example_en: His description is exaggerated.

example_zh: 不要夸大其词。
example_py: Búyào kuādà qī cí.
example_en: Don't exaggerate.

example_zh: 他轻描淡写地提到这个问题。
example_py: Tā qīngmiáo dànxiě de tídào zhège wèntí.
example_en: He lightly touched upon this issue.

meaning: obscure and tortuous; hidden and complex
example_zh: 他的表达有些隐晦曲折。
example_py: Tā de biǎodá yǒuxiē yǐnhuì qūzhé.
example_en: His expression is somewhat obscure and complex.

example_zh: 他直言不讳地说出了真实想法。
example_py: Tā zhíyán búhuì de shuōchū le zhēnshí xiǎngfǎ.
example_en: He spoke frankly without hiding his true thoughts.

meaning: to get straight to the point
example_zh: 让我开门见山地说一下。
example_py: Ràng wǒ kāi mén jiàn shān de shuō yíxià.
example_en: Let me get straight to the point.

meaning: to approach indirectly; to hint at
example_zh: 他用旁敲侧击的方法表达意见。
example_py: Tā yòng páng qiāo cè jī de fāngfǎ biǎodá yìjiàn.
example_en: He expressed opinions through indirect hints.

meaning: to praise by first belittling; to enhance by first diminishing
example_zh: 这个手法运用了欲扬先抑的技巧。
example_py: Zhège shǒufǎ yùnyòng le yùyáng xiānyi de jìqiǎo.
example_en: This technique employs the method of belittling before praising.

meaning: contrast and foil; comparison and setting off
example_zh: 通过对比衬托来强调主题。
example_py: Tōngguò duìbǐ chèntuō lái qiángdiào zhǔtí.
example_en: To emphasize the theme through contrast and foil.

meaning: to use scenery to express feeling
example_zh: 这首诗借景抒情，很有意蕴。
example_py: Zhè shǒu shī jiè jǐng shūqíng, hěn yǒu yìyùn.
example_en: This poem uses scenery to express emotion, very meaningful.

meaning: to use objects as a medium to express one's aspirations
example_zh: 梅兰竹菊托物言志的高洁品质。
example_py: Méi lán zhú jú tuō wù yánzhì de gāojié pǐnzhì.
example_en: Plum, orchid, bamboo, chrysanthemum express noble character through objects.

example_zh: 这篇文章采用了第一人称叙述。
example_py: Zhè piān wénzhāng cǎiyòng le dì yī rénchēng xùshù.
example_en: This article uses first-person narration.

example_zh: 作者对景物的描写很细致。
example_py: Zuòzhě duì jǐngwù de miáoxiě hěn xìzhì.
example_en: The author's description of scenery is very detailed.

example_zh: 这篇评论文章充满议论性。
example_py: Zhè piān píngliùn wénzhāng chōngmǎn yìlùn xìng.
example_en: This opinion article is full of argumentation.

example_zh: 这首诗充满了抒情的气息。
