example_en: The community has an access control system.

example_zh: 我需要缴纳这个月的水电费。
example_py: Wǒ xūyào jiǎonà zhège yuè de shuǐ diàn fèi.
example_en: I need to pay this month's water and electricity bill.

example_zh: 这道菜肴很美味。
example_py: Zhè dào càiyáo hěn měiwèi.
example_en: This dish is delicious.

example_zh: 我们需要购买一些新鲜的食材。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào gòumǎi yīxiē xīnxiān de shíhuò.
example_en: We need to buy some fresh ingredients.

example_zh: 她喜欢烹饪。
example_py: Tā xǐhuān pēngrèn.
example_en: She enjoys cooking.

example_zh: 这个菜的口味很独特。
example_py: Zhège cài de kǒuwèi hěn dúté.
example_en: This dish has a unique taste.

example_zh: 健康的饮食习惯很重要。
example_py: Jiànkāng de yǐnshí xíguàn hěn zhòngyào.
example_en: Healthy dietary habits are important.

example_zh: 这家餐厅的服务很好。
example_py: Zhè jiā cāntīng de fúwù hěn hǎo.
example_en: This restaurant has excellent service.

meaning: to order food; to place an order
example_zh: 我们已经点餐了。
example_py: Wǒmen yǐjīng diǎncān le.
example_en: We have already ordered our food.

example_zh: 我经常点外卖。
example_py: Wǒ jīngcháng diǎn wàimài.
example_en: I often order takeout.

meaning: to have a meal; to dine
example_zh: 我们在餐厅用餐。
example_py: Wǒmen zài cāntīng yònɡcān.
example_en: We dined at the restaurant.

example_zh: 她在节食来减肥。
example_py: Tā zài jiéshí lái jiǎnféi.
example_en: She is dieting to lose weight.

example_zh: 他喜欢吃零食。
example_py: Tā xǐhuān chī língshí.
example_en: He likes to eat snacks.

example_zh: 食品安全非常重要。
example_py: Shípǐn ānquán fēicháng zhòngyào.
example_en: Food safety is extremely important.

example_zh: 有机食品更健康。
example_py: Yǒujī shípǐn gèng jiànkāng.
example_en: Organic food is healthier.

example_zh: 我吃素食已经三年了。
example_py: Wǒ chī sùshí yǐjīng sān nián le.
example_en: I have been eating vegetarian food for three years.

example_zh: 这种食物的营养价值很高。
example_py: Zhè zhǒnɡ shíwù de yínɡyǎnɡ jiàzhí hěn gāo.
example_en: This food has high nutritional value.

example_zh: 城市的交通很拥挤。
example_py: Chéngshì de jiāotōnɡ hěn yōnɡjǐ.
example_en: City traffic is very crowded.

meaning: traffic jam; to get stuck in traffic
example_zh: 今天上班堵车了。
example_py: Jīntiān shàngbān dǔchē le.
example_en: I got stuck in traffic on the way to work today.

example_zh: 我每天坐地铁上班。
example_py: Wǒ měitiān zuò dìtiě shàngbān.
example_en: I take the subway to work every day.

example_zh: 公交车很便宜。
example_py: Gōngjiāo chē hěn piányi.
example_en: Public buses are very affordable.

example_zh: 我打了一辆出租车。
example_py: Wǒ dǎle yī liàng chūzūchē.
example_en: I hailed a taxi.

example_zh: 我用网约车去机场。
example_py: Wǒ yònɡ wǎnɡyuēchē qù jīchǎnɡ.
example_en: I used a ride-hailing app to go to the airport.

example_zh: 高铁很快很舒服。
example_py: Ɡāotiě hěn kuài hěn shūfu.
example_en: High-speed trains are fast and comfortable.

example_zh: 这班航班延迟了。
example_py: Zhè bān hánɡbān yánchíle.
example_en: This flight was delayed.

example_zh: 这次旅行的行程很紧凑。
example_py: Zhè cì lǚxínɡ de xínɡchénɡ hěn jǐnzòu.
example_en: This trip's itinerary is very tight.

example_zh: 用导航找到这家餐厅。
example_py: Yònɡ dǎohánɡ zhǎodào zhè jiā cāntīnɡ.
example_en: I used GPS to find this restaurant.

example_zh: 我今年考了驾照。
example_py: Wǒ jīnnián kǎole jiàzhào.
example_en: I got my driver's license this year.

example_zh: 这个停车场有一百个车位。
example_py: Zhège tíngchēchǎnɡ yǒu yībǎi ɡe chēwèi.
example_en: This parking lot has one hundred parking spaces.

example_zh: 周末我喜欢骑行。
example_py: Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuān qíxínɡ.
example_en: I like cycling on weekends.

example_zh: 我周末去购物。
example_py: Wǒ zhōumò qù ɡòuwù.
example_en: I go shopping on weekends.

meaning: to consume; consumption; to spend money
example_zh: 她的消费很高。
example_py: Tā de xiāofèi hěn ɡāo.
example_en: Her spending is very high.

example_zh: 这个店有很大的折扣。
example_py: Zhège diàn yǒu hěn dà de zhékòu.
example_en: This store has big discounts.

example_zh: 这周有特别的优惠。
example_py: Zhè zhōu yǒu tèbié de yōuhuì.
example_en: There are special discounts this week.

example_zh: 这件衣服我想退换货。
example_py: Zhè jiàn yīfu wǒ xiǎnɡ tuìhuàn huò.
example_en: I want to return or exchange this piece of clothing.

example_zh: 我经常网购。
example_py: Wǒ jīnɡcháng wǎnɡɡòu.
example_en: I shop online frequently.

example_zh: 我的快递已经到了。
example_py: Wǒ de kuàidì yǐjīnɡ dàole.
example_en: My express delivery has arrived.

example_zh: 我收到了一个包裹。
example_py: Wǒ shōudàole yī ɡe bāoɡuǒ.
example_en: I received a package.

meaning: to receive goods; to accept delivery
example_zh: 我今天收货了。
example_py: Wǒ jīntiān shōuhuò le.
example_en: I received my delivery today.

example_zh: 你可以用支付宝支付。
example_py: Nǐ kěyǐ yònɡ zhīfùbǎo zhīfù.
example_en: You can pay with Alipay.

example_zh: 我用信用卡刷卡了。
example_py: Wǒ yònɡ xìnyònɡkǎ shuākǎ le.
example_en: I paid with a credit card.

example_zh: 你可以扫码支付。
example_py: Nǐ kěyǐ sǎomǎ zhīfù.
example_en: You can scan a code to pay.

meaning: to go to work; to work
example_zh: 我每天八点上班。
example_py: Wǒ měitiān bā diǎn shànɡbān.
example_en: I go to work at eight o'clock every day.

meaning: to leave work; to get off work
example_zh: 我五点下班。
example_py: Wǒ wǔ diǎn xiàbān.
example_en: I leave work at five o'clock.

example_zh: 我经常加班。
example_py: Wǒ jīnɡcháng jiābān.
example_en: I often work overtime.

meaning: to be away on business; business trip
example_zh: 他这周出差了。
example_py: Tā zhè zhōu chūchāi le.
example_en: He is away on a business trip this week.

chars.m: difference; to go on a trip

example_zh: 今天有一个重要会议。
example_py: Jīntiān yǒu yī ɡe zhònɡyào huìyì.
example_en: There is an important meeting today.

example_zh: 我的同事很友好。
example_py: Wǒ de tónɡshì hěn yǒuhǎo.
example_en: My colleagues are very friendly.

example_zh: 我的上司很严格。
example_py: Wǒ de shànɡsī hěn yánɡé.
example_en: My boss is very strict.

example_zh: 我在销售部门工作。
example_py: Wǒ zài xiāoshòu bùmén ɡōnɡzuò.
example_en: I work in the sales department.

example_zh: 这份工作的薪资不错。
example_py: Zhè fèn ɡōnɡzuò de xīnzī búcuò.
example_en: The salary for this job is not bad.

example_zh: 公司给员工提供很好的福利。
example_py: Ɡōnɡsī ɡěi yuánɡōnɡ tīɡōnɡ hěn hǎo de fúlì.
example_en: The company provides excellent benefits to employees.

example_zh: 我在办公室工作。
example_py: Wǒ zài bànɡōnɡshì ɡōnɡzuò.
example_en: I work in the office.

example_zh: 我每周有两天远程办公。
example_py: Wǒ měi zhōu yǒu liǎnɡ tiān yuǎnchénɡ bànɡōnɡ.
example_en: I work remotely two days a week.

example_zh: 这周末有个聚会。
example_py: Zhè zhōumò yǒu ɡe jùhuì.
example_en: There is a gathering this weekend.

meaning: to host a banquet; to entertain at dinner
example_zh: 老板宴请了客户。
example_py: Lǎobǎn yànqǐnɡle kèhuò.
example_en: The boss hosted a banquet for the clients.

example_zh: 我邀请你来我家。
example_py: Wǒ yāoqǐnɡ nǐ lái wǒ jiā.
example_en: I invite you to come to my house.

meaning: to propose a toast; to drink a toast
example_zh: 让我敬你一杯酒。
example_py: Rànɡ wǒ jìnɡ nǐ yī bēi jiǔ.
example_en: Let me propose a toast to you.

example_zh: 他送了我一个礼物。
example_py: Tā sònɡle wǒ yī ɡe lǐwù.
example_en: He gave me a gift.

example_zh: 他们的婚礼很隆重。
example_py: Tāmen de hūnlǐ hěn lónɡzhònɡ.
example_en: Their wedding was very grand.

example_zh: 他参加了葬礼。
example_py: Tā cānjiāle zànɡlǐ.
example_en: He attended the funeral.

example_zh: 公司举办了成立十周年庆典。
example_py: Ɡōnɡsī jǔbànle chénɡlì shí zhōunián qìnɡdiǎn.
example_en: The company held a celebration for its 10th anniversary.

example_zh: 今天是我们结婚纪念日。
example_py: Jīntiān shì wǒmen jiéhūn jìniàn rì.
example_en: Today is our wedding anniversary.

example_zh: 我祝贺你升职。
example_py: Wǒ zhùhè nǐ shēnɡzhí.
example_en: I congratulate you on your promotion.

meaning: to express sympathy; to console; condolences
example_zh: 我去慰问病人。
example_py: Wǒ qù wèiwèn bìnɡrén.
example_en: I visited the sick person to offer condolences.

chars.m: to ask; to inquire; to express concern

example_zh: 不用那么客气。
example_py: Búyònɡ nàme kèqi.
example_en: Don't be so polite.

meaning: conventional courtesy; polite remarks; small talk
example_zh: 他们的对话都是客套。
example_py: Tāmen de duìhuà dōu shì kètào.
example_en: Their conversation was just polite small talk.

example_zh: 他们在寒暄。
example_py: Tāmen zài hánxuān.
example_en: They are exchanging pleasantries.

example_zh: 我喜欢旅游。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān lǚyóu.
example_en: I like to travel.

example_zh: 这是城市最著名的景点。
example_py: Zhè shì chéngshì zuì zhùmínɡ de jǐnɡdiǎn.
example_en: This is the city's most famous attraction.

example_zh: 这里的风景很美。
example_py: Zhèlǐ de fēnɡjǐnɡ hěn měi.
example_en: The scenery here is beautiful.

example_zh: 我们需要找住宿的地方。
example_py: Wǒmen xūyào zhǎo zhùsù de dìfang.
example_en: We need to find accommodation.

meaning: to book a ticket; to reserve a ticket
example_zh: 我已经订票了。
example_py: Wǒ yǐjīnɡ dìnɡpiào le.
example_en: I have already booked my ticket.

chars.m: to book; to order; to reserve

example_zh: 我需要办签证。
example_py: Wǒ xūyào bàn qiānzhènɡ.
example_en: I need to get a visa.

example_zh: 我的行李太多了。
example_py: Wǒ de xínɡli tài duō le.
example_en: I have too much luggage.

example_zh: 导游给我们介绍了历史。
example_py: Dǎoyóu ɡěi wǒmen jièshàole lìshǐ.
example_en: The tour guide introduced the history to us.

example_zh: 从山顶看到的景观很壮观。
example_py: Cóng shāndǐnɡ kàndào de jǐnɡɡuān hěn zhuànɡɡuān.
example_en: The view from the mountain top is spectacular.

example_zh: 这里有很多游客。
example_py: Zhèlǐ yǒu hěnduō yóukè.
example_en: There are many tourists here.

example_zh: 我想去度假。
example_py: Wǒ xiǎnɡ qù dùjià.
example_en: I want to take a vacation.

example_zh: 周末是休闲的好时光。
example_py: Zhōumò shì xiūxián de hǎo shíɡuānɡ.
example_en: Weekends are a good time to relax.

example_zh: 看电影是我喜欢的娱乐方式。
example_py: Kàn diànyǐnɡ shì wǒ xǐhuān de yúlè fāngshì.
example_en: Watching movies is my favorite form of entertainment.

example_zh: 我喜欢户外活动。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān hùwài huódònɡ.
example_en: I like outdoor activities.

example_zh: 我周末去登山。
example_py: Wǒ zhōumò qù dēnɡshān.
example_en: I go mountain climbing on weekends.

example_zh: 我们去露营了。
example_py: Wǒmen qù lùyínɡ le.
example_en: We went camping.

example_zh: 我喜欢游泳。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān yóuyǒnɡ.
example_en: I like swimming.

example_zh: 我去年学会了滑雪。
example_py: Wǒ qùnián xuéhuì le huáxuě.
example_en: I learned to ski last year.

meaning: to ride a horse; horseback riding
example_zh: 我们去骑马。
example_py: Wǒmen qù qímǎ.
example_en: We went horseback riding.

example_zh: 我的爷爷喜欢钓鱼。
example_py: Wǒ de yéyeɡu xǐhuān diàoyú.
example_en: My grandfather likes fishing.

example_zh: 我们去博物馆参观。
example_py: Wǒmen qù báwùɡuǎn cānɡuān.
example_en: We visited the museum.

example_zh: 这个美术馆有很多名画。
example_py: Zhège měishùɡuǎn yǒu hěnduō mính uà.
example_en: This art gallery has many famous paintings.

example_zh: 我们去电影院看电影。
example_py: Wǒmen qù diànyǐnɡ yuàn kàn diànyǐnɡ.
example_en: We went to the cinema to watch a movie.

example_zh: 我买了演唱会的票。
example_py: Wǒ mǎile yǎnchànɡ huì de piào.
example_en: I bought a concert ticket.

example_zh: 我喜欢踢足球。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān tī zúqiú.
example_en: I like to play soccer.

example_zh: 他们在打篮球。
example_py: Tāmen zài dǎ lánqiú.
example_en: They are playing basketball.

example_zh: 我们打乒乓球。
example_py: Wǒmen dǎ pīnɡpānɡ qiú.
example_en: We play table tennis.

example_zh: 我喜欢吃冰淇淋。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān chī bīnɡ qīlín.
example_en: I like eating ice cream.

example_zh: 我每天喝咖啡。
example_py: Wǒ měitiān hē kāfēi.
example_en: I drink coffee every day.

example_zh: 我喜欢喝茶。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān hē chá.
example_en: I like to drink tea.

example_zh: 我们晚上去酒吧。
example_py: Wǒmen wǎnshang qù jiǔbā.
example_en: We went to the bar in the evening.

example_zh: 我们去KTV唱歌。
example_py: Wǒmen qù KTV chànɡɡē.
example_en: We went to the karaoke bar to sing.

example_zh: 我喜欢下棋。
example_py: Wǒ xǐhuān xiàqí.
example_en: I like to play chess.

example_zh: 我们打牌。
example_py: Wǒmen dǎ pái.
example_en: We play cards.
